get.summary: Get all available services for your API client.
get.description: This endpoint retrieves all services available to your API client.

parameters.name: filter[package_type]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of package types to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[carrier]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of carrier ids to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[region_from]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of region ids to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[region_to]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of region ids to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[address_from][country_code]
parameters.description: Country code of origin location to filter by. May be used instead of region_from and can be combined with filter[address_from][region_code] and filter[address_from][postal_code] for more accurate results.

parameters.name: filter[address_from][region_code]
parameters.description: Region code of origin location to filter by. May be used instead of region_from and can be combined with filter[address_from][country_code] and filter[address_from][postal_code] for more accurate results.

parameters.name: filter[address_from][postal_code]
parameters.description: Postal code of origin location to filter by. May be used instead of region_from and can be combined with filter[address_from][country_code] and filter[address_from][region_code] for more accurate results.

parameters.name: filter[address_to][country_code]
parameters.description: Country code of destination location to filter by. May be used instead of region_to and can be combined with filter[address_to][region_code] and filter[address_to][postal_code] for more accurate results.

parameters.name: filter[address_to][region_code]
parameters.description: Region code of destination location to filter by. May be used instead of region_to and can be combined with filter[address_to][country_code] and filter[address_to][postal_code] for more accurate results.

parameters.name: filter[address_to][postal_code]
parameters.description: Postal code of destination location to filter by. May be used instead of region_to and can be combined with filter[address_to][country_code] and filter[address_to][region_code] for more accurate results.

parameters.name: filter[has_active_contract]
parameters.description:
Boolean value.
  • `true` Only services with active contract associations.
  • `false` Only services without active contract associations.

parameters.name: filter[delivery_method]
parameters.description:
Filter the services retrieved based on given delivery method. Possible options are:
  • `delivery`
  • `pick-up`

parameters.name: filter[code]
parameters.description: Filter the services retrieved based on given code.
